languages.text: "Наш клан уже не одну сотню лет отвечает за охрану Вольного Торговца во время отдыха". {n}Блюстительница произносит это с великой гордостью.{/n} "Меня еще бабка учила премудростям несения вахты в купальне".

"For hundreds of years, our clan has been responsible for ensuring the Rogue Trader's safety during times of leisure and relaxation." {n}The enforcer's voice is filled with pride.{/n} "I guard the bathchamber, just as my grandmother did before me. She trained me herself and instructed me in my duties."
languages.original_text: "Наш клан уже не одну сотню лет отвечает за охрану Вольного Торговца во время отдыха". {n}Блюстительница произносит это с великой гордостью.{/n} "Меня еще бабка учила премудростям несения вахты в купальне".

traits.locale_text: "For hundreds of years now our clan's charge has been protecting the Rogue Trader's rest," {n}the enforcer says with great pride in her voice.{/n} "I still remember how my grandmother was explaining to me the ins and outs of the bathchamber watch."

"For hundreds of years now our clan's charge has been protecting the Rogue Trader's rest," {n}the enforcer says with great pride in her voice.{/n} "I still remember how my grandmother was explaining to me the ins and outs of the bathchamber watch."

"For hundreds of years, our clan has been responsible for ensuring the Rogue Trader's safety during times of leisure and relaxation." {n}The enforcer's voice is filled with pride.{/n} "I guard the bathchamber, just as my grandmother did before me. She trained me herself and instructed me in my duties."

"For hundreds of years, our clan has been responsible for ensuring the Rogue Trader's safety during times of leisure and relaxation." {n}The enforcer's voice is filled with pride.{/n} "I guard the bathchamber, just as my grandmother did before me. She trained me herself and instructed me in my duties."

"For hundreds of years, our clan has been responsible for ensuring the Rogue Trader's safety during times of leisure and relaxation." {n}The enforcer's voice is filled with pride.{/n} "I guard the bathchamber, just as my grandmother did before me. She trained me herself and instructed me in my duties."

languages.text: « Depuis des siècles, notre clan est chargé d'assurer la protection des libres-marchands pendant leurs moments de loisir et de détente, {n}déclare la prévôt d'une voix empreinte de fierté.{/n} Je garde la salle de bain, tout comme le faisait ma grand-mère avant moi. C'est elle qui m'a formée et qui m'a appris tout ce que j'avais besoin de savoir pour accomplir mon devoir. »
languages.original_text: "For hundreds of years, our clan has been responsible for ensuring the Rogue Trader's safety during times of leisure and relaxation." {n}The enforcer's voice is filled with pride.{/n} "I guard the bathchamber, just as my grandmother did before me. She trained me herself and instructed me in my duties."

traits.locale_text: « Depuis des siècles, notre clan est chargé d'assurer la protection des libres-marchands pendant leurs moments de loisir et de détente, {n}déclare la prévôt d'une voix empreinte de fierté.{/n} Je garde la salle de bain, tout comme le faisait ma grand-mère avant moi. C'est elle qui m'a formée et qui m'a appris tout ce que j'avais besoin de savoir pour accomplir mon devoir. »

languages.text: «Durante siglos, nuestro clan ha sido responsable por la seguridad de los Comerciantes Independientes en momentos de esparcimiento y relajación». {n}La voz de la guardia está cargada de orgullo.{/n} «Protejo la cámara de baño, al igual que hizo mi abuela antes que yo. Me entrenó y me instruyó en mis deberes ella misma».
languages.original_text: "For hundreds of years, our clan has been responsible for ensuring the Rogue Trader's safety during times of leisure and relaxation." {n}The enforcer's voice is filled with pride.{/n} "I guard the bathchamber, just as my grandmother did before me. She trained me herself and instructed me in my duties."

traits.locale_text: «Durante siglos, nuestro clan ha sido responsable por la seguridad de los Comerciantes Independientes en momentos de esparcimiento y relajación». {n}La voz de la guardia está cargada de orgullo.{/n} «Protejo la cámara de baño, al igual que hizo mi abuela antes que yo. Me entrenó y me instruyó en mis deberes ella misma».

languages.text: “几百年来，我们的氏族一直负责守护行商浪人，确保行商浪人在休闲、放松时不会受到任何威胁。”{n}执法者的声音里充满了自豪。{/n}“我负责守护浴室。我的祖母之前也负责这个职位，她亲自训练我，指导我的工作。”
languages.original_text: "For hundreds of years, our clan has been responsible for ensuring the Rogue Trader's safety during times of leisure and relaxation." {n}The enforcer's voice is filled with pride.{/n} "I guard the bathchamber, just as my grandmother did before me. She trained me herself and instructed me in my duties."

traits.locale_text: “几百年来，我们的氏族一直负责守护行商浪人，确保行商浪人在休闲、放松时不会受到任何威胁。”{n}执法者的声音里充满了自豪。{/n}“我负责守护浴室。我的祖母之前也负责这个职位，她亲自训练我，指导我的工作。”

languages.text: 「400年もの間、私達のクランはローグトレーダーの安全を保障してきた。約束した休憩時間の間もだ。{n}エンフォーサーの子は、誇りでいっぱいだった。{/n}私は風呂場の番をしています。祖母が私より前にしていたように。祖母は私を訓練し、職務を指導してくれました」
languages.original_text: "For hundreds of years, our clan has been responsible for ensuring the Rogue Trader's safety during times of leisure and relaxation." {n}The enforcer's voice is filled with pride.{/n} "I guard the bathchamber, just as my grandmother did before me. She trained me herself and instructed me in my duties."

traits.locale_text: 「400年もの間、私達のクランはローグトレーダーの安全を保障してきた。約束した休憩時間の間もだ。{n}エンフォーサーの子は、誇りでいっぱいだった。{/n}私は風呂場の番をしています。祖母が私より前にしていたように。祖母は私を訓練し、職務を指導してくれました」

languages.text: "Unser Clan ist seit hunderten von Jahren dafür verantwortlich, die Sicherheit des Freihändlers in Zeiten der Ruhe und Entspannung zu gewährleisten." {n}Die Stimme des Enforcers ist voller Stolz.{/n} "Ich bewache das Badegemach, genau wie meine Großmutter es vor mir getan hat. Sie hat mich selbst ausgebildet und mich in meinen Pflichten unterwiesen."
languages.original_text: "For hundreds of years, our clan has been responsible for ensuring the Rogue Trader's safety during times of leisure and relaxation." {n}The enforcer's voice is filled with pride.{/n} "I guard the bathchamber, just as my grandmother did before me. She trained me herself and instructed me in my duties."

traits.locale_text: "Unser Clan ist seit hunderten von Jahren dafür verantwortlich, die Sicherheit des Freihändlers in Zeiten der Ruhe und Entspannung zu gewährleisten." {n}Die Stimme des Enforcers ist voller Stolz.{/n} "Ich bewache das Badegemach, genau wie meine Großmutter es vor mir getan hat. Sie hat mich selbst ausgebildet und mich in meinen Pflichten unterwiesen."
